entry.title: Maps not working
entry.content:
Sep 19, 06:20 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 19, 06:15 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 19, 06:09 PDT

entry.title: RootMetrics products impacted on Google Chrome
entry.content:
May 2, 21:35 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been completely resolved.

May 2, 18:24 PDT
Identified - Rootmetrics.com, Login, RootInsights, and Export API are now updated to use an alternate certificate and now load correctly in Google Chrome.

May 2, 15:34 PDT
Investigating - An issue has been identified that is causing a partial outage on RootMetrics products when accessed by Google Chrome.

This has been identified as an external issue caused by a Certificate Issuer and Google Chrome. Please use an alternate browser in the interim if required.

The team is working on a temporary fix while the root cause is addressed by Google. Other Speedtest and Ookla systems are operating normally.

entry.title: Degraded performance on Speedtest.net
entry.content:
May 2, 08:29 PDT
Resolved - This incident is now fully resolved. We identified an issue with the configuration of a backend dependency. The Ookla engineering team is continuing to monitor.

May 2, 08:02 PDT
Identified - An issue has been identified that is causing a partial outage on Speedtest.net. The Ookla engineering team has identified the problem and is working on a fix. Other Speedtest and Ookla systems are operating normally.

entry.title: Speedtest Intelligence timing out
entry.content:
Apr 20, 20:27 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 20, 20:16 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been identified and implemented. Speedtest Intelligence has returned to normal service. The Ookla engineering team continues to monitor to ensure that no further problems are experienced.

Apr 20, 19:58 PDT
Investigating - The Speedtest Intelligence analytics portal is experiencing timeouts when accessing certain page elements. The Ookla engineering team is actively investigating and will update this page as the status changes.

entry.title: Provider Connectivity issue
entry.content:
Dec 15, 08:06 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 15, 07:59 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 15, 07:57 PST
Investigating - A Provider Connectivity issue has disrupted the availability of Speedtest consumer, Enterprise, and intelligence. Ookla has switched to a secondary site. During this time, Speedtest results may not persist.

entry.title: Speedtest.net outage
entry.content:
Oct 4, 12:40 PDT
Resolved - This incident is now fully resolved. The Ookla engineering team continue to closely monitor global internet traffic patterns.

Oct 4, 10:22 PDT
Update - All systems are fully operational, and the Ookla engineering team is continuing to monitor. Please see https://downdetector.com/ for continued status on the global service outages that contributed to this incident.

Oct 4, 09:10 PDT
Monitoring - Speedtest.net is operational, but in a state of degraded performance. The Ookla engineering team is continuing to manage the systems and return the services to full performance.

Oct 4, 08:52 PDT
Identified - Speedtest.net and associated Speedtest applications are experiencing an outage. The Ookla engineering team is investigating and will keep this status page updated

entry.title: Partial Outage at our Authentication Provider Causing Slow Logins
entry.content:
Sep 28, 09:59 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 28, 09:36 PDT
Monitoring - Our authentication provider has implemented a fix and performance has returned to normal.

Sep 28, 09:03 PDT
Identified - An issue at our authentication provider is impacting logins to our enterprise sites. It may take up to 25 seconds for authentication to succeed. Our provider has identified the issue and is working on a resolution.

entry.title: Some Speedtest servers unavailable on speedtest.net and Speedtest Custom due to TLS certificate errors
entry.content:
Sep 22, 12:45 PDT
Resolved - The issue impacting TLS certificates for some Speedtest.net servers is now resolved. If you are still experiencing a problem with your server, please contact the Ookla server support team.

Sep 22, 12:04 PDT
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Sep 22, 11:29 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented. Impacted servers are again receiving updated TLS certificates automatically.

Sep 22, 08:32 PDT
Identified - The Ookla engineering team is investigating an issue impacting a portion of the Speedtest Server network servers due to a TLS certificate issue. These servers are available and performing normally for Speedtest mobile and desktop apps but are currently unavailable for web-based tests, including speedtest.net and Speedtest Custom.

The engineering team has identified the cause and are currently working on a fix.

entry.title: Some Speedtest.net website users experiencing missing test results
entry.content:
Sep 9, 11:59 PDT
Resolved - The issue impacting a subset of user's historical Speedtest.net results history is now resolved.

Sep 8, 14:09 PDT
Identified - Some users of the Speedtest.net website are currently unable to view their previous Speedtest results via the "Results History" section of the site. The engineering team has identified the issue and are working on a fix. Other aspects of the Speedtest.net website continue to function normally, and Speedtest results continue to provide accurate measurements.

Aug 31, 12:18 PDT
Investigating - Our Authentication provider is currently experiencing an outage that may cause some logons to fail for Speedtest Intelligence and Speedtest Enterprise Dashboards. We are aware of the issue and are working with our provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

entry.title: Speedtest Outage due to failure of content delivery network
entry.content:
Jun 8, 04:22 PDT
Resolved - Speedtest.net and associated services, including all Speedtest mobile apps, have returned to normal operations. Our engineering team is continuing to monitor.

Jun 8, 03:45 PDT
Monitoring - Speedtest.net and associated services, including all Speedtest mobile apps, have returned to normal operations. Our primary CDN provider has identified the underlying issue, and a fix has been implemented.

If you are still receiving errors visiting one of our web properties, please refresh, clear cache, or try restarting your browser.

Jun 8, 03:13 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 8, 03:10 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 8, 03:09 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified.

Jun 8, 03:09 PDT
Investigating - User are experiencing are experiencing errors connecting to

Speedtest.net
Speedtest Custom
Speedtest Enterprise
Speedtest Web
Speedtest Intelligence

Downdetector comments may be unavailable at this time.

This is due to a failure at our Content Delivery Network provider that is currently being investigated.

entry.title: Outage at our Authentication Provider Preventing Logins
entry.content:
Apr 20, 14:35 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 20, 14:34 PDT
Update - Auth0 has now restored the affected regions of @auth0 for US-1.

Apr 20, 13:34 PDT
Monitoring - Auth0 continues to see customers that have moved to degraded performance. Systems are recovering.Auth0 is continuing to dedicate their full team's efforts on restoring services for all customers impacted by this incident.

Apr 20, 13:09 PDT
Update - The Auth0 team is continuing to work on restoring services for their outage. The entire Auth0 technical and engineering teams are taking this as an all hands on deck situation to find resolution. Users who are logged in are not impacted by this incident.

Apr 20, 12:47 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Apr 20, 12:46 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Apr 20, 09:14 PDT
Identified - An outage affecting our Authentication provider Auth0 is currently preventing logins to our Speedtest Intelligence portal and to our Speedtest Custom dashboard. The customer Speedtest Custom sites are unaffected. We are monitoring the situation as Auth0 engineers are working on this issue.

entry.title: Speedtest Intelligence Data Aggregation Delay for 2021-02-27
entry.content:
Feb 28, 13:26 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 28, 08:56 PST
Monitoring - Some of the data processing jobs for the performance aggregates failed to run last night. This has resulted in aggregation data processing being delayed for the for the date: 2021-02-27. The data will appear in the Speedtest Intelligence portal when the data processing jobs are complete.

entry.title: Incident impacting Speedtest.net
entry.content:
Nov 11, 17:56 PST
Resolved - All Speedtest services continue to be stable after a brief incident earlier today. This issue is now resolved, and the Ookla engineering team is continuing to monitor.

Nov 11, 17:03 PST
Monitoring - Speedtest.net and associated services were briefly impacted by slowness and service timeouts between 2020-11-12 00:11:00 and 2020-11-12 00:26:20 UTC today. The Ookla engineering team has mitigated the issue and is continuing to actively monitor all services.

entry.title: Intermittent errors on Downdetector.com
entry.content:
Jun 9, 19:01 PDT
Resolved - The Downdetector website including downdetector.com experienced a partial outage from 23:12 UTC on 06-June through 00:05 UTC on 07-June (53 minutes) due to a backend systems issue. During this time, end users of Downdetector may have received intermittent errors or timeouts when accessing the site, while others experienced degraded site performance. Full service was restored at 07-June at 00:05 UTC. During this period, report volumes would have been reduced as some users were unable to report service outages.
